siteMetadata.title: Mental Belly Rubs
siteMetadata.subtitle: Cooks with hot fire. Codes with pure lighting. Writes like a sumo tango dancer. Eats ice cream with a little spoon.

frontmatter.title: Learning to type faster: Why?
frontmatter.description: We are going to begin a 30 day journey of 10 mins/day typing practice on keybr.com to see what happens!
